attributes.action: Make Businesses around the UK SWITCH OFF their office lights & computers not being used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government drive to educate its citizens into switching off lights in rooms not being used, or boiling just enough water in the kettle, and reducing overall domestic energy consumption and carbon footprint is laughable, especially when you consider all the those office lights burning away all night, every night in coomercial and local government buildings all over the UK.
Therefore is time that the PM gets the business sector to SWITCH OFF too !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
